name: Super Tape Man
description:
Play as Richard Ripairmin, the Super Tape Man, as he navigates through levels collecting tape and using it to platform over various challenges!

Controls

Move - WASD

Tape-Em - Click on Flags to save checkpoints and on gray walls to create wooden floors!

Reset to Checkpoint - "R"

--------------------------

Code/Level Design - @Babajyo

Art/SFX - @Fishfinger

We hope you enjoy our unofficial Global Game Jam submission (and our first game jam collectively)! The theme was "Repair".
